content: Singaporean lyricist (1960–2020) **Jo Heng** (1960 – 9 January 2020), also known as **Xing Zenghua**, was a Singaporean lyricist. She died from lymphoma, a type of blood cancer, on 9 January 2020 at the age of 59. ## Personal life Heng studied in [Bukit Panjang Government High School](/wiki/Bukit_Panjang_Government_High_School) and [Thomson Secondary School](/wiki/Thomson_Secondary_School), and focused on Chinese composition. She worked in factories before joining Xin He Magazine. ## Career She also wrote the lyrics for [Andy Lau](/wiki/Andy_Lau)'s "The Path Winds Through High Peaks" which was released in 1994.
